snippet: The group says it is trying to protect those who face Israeli soldiers on the other side of a fence, after two people were killed by Israeli fire this year.
abstract: Hamas deploys police officers and security forces to prevent Palestinian protesters from approaching fence that separates Gaza from Israel, in effort to protect protesters after two people were killed by Israeli fire.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The group says it is trying to protect those who face Israeli soldiers on the other side of a fence, after two people were killed by Israeli fire this year.

headline.main: Hamas Chases Protesters From Gaza-Israel Border
headline.print_headline: Hamas Chases Protesters From Gaza-Israel Border
